name: Ausd
description: AUSD, a digital dollar minted 1:1 with USD fiat. AUSD is designed to be a secure digital currency, utilizing one of the worldâ€™s largest custodian banks to safeguard assets. AUSD enables users to participate in trading, lending and payments.
